meanings.definition: The state or quality of being hairy.
meanings.sent1: His hirsutenesses made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The hirsutenesses of the bear kept it warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The hirsutenesses of the dog made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The hirsutenesses of the forest created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't help but admire the hirsutenesses of the teddy bear.

meanings.definition: The presence of an excessive amount of hair.
meanings.sent1: The hirsutenesses on his face made him look older than he was.
meanings.sent2: The hirsutenesses on the carpet indicated it needed a good vacuuming.
meanings.sent3: The hirsutenesses on the fruit surprised the shoppers at the market.
meanings.sent4: The hirsutenesses on the spider's legs helped it sense vibrations.
meanings.sent5: The hirsutenesses on the doll's head made it look realistic.
